name: iPhone 13 Pro
description: The iPhone 13 Pro is the latest flagship smartphone from Apple. It features a stunning Super Retina XDR display, powerful A15 Bionic chip, and advanced triple-camera system.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra is a premium Android smartphone with a large Dynamic AMOLED display, versatile quad-camera system, and powerful Exynos 2100 processor.

name: Google Pixel 6 Pro
description: The Google Pixel 6 Pro offers exceptional camera capabilities with its advanced computational photography features. It also boasts a smooth 120Hz display and powerful performance.

name: OnePlus 9 Pro
description: The OnePlus 9 Pro is a high-performance Android smartphone with a beautiful Fluid AMOLED display, Hasselblad-tuned quad-camera system, and fast Warp Charge technology.

name: Xiaomi Mi 11
description: The Xiaomi Mi 11 is a feature-packed smartphone with a stunning 120Hz AMOLED display, powerful Snapdragon 888 processor, and versatile triple-camera setup.

name: Sony Xperia 1 III
description: The Sony Xperia 1 III is a flagship smartphone with a 4K OLED display, professional-grade camera system, and powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 processor.

name: Huawei P50 Pro
description: The Huawei P50 Pro features an innovative camera system co-engineered with Leica, a stunning OLED display, and powerful Kirin 9000 processor.

name: Motorola Edge+
description: The Motorola Edge+ offers a large OLED display with a 144Hz refresh rate, a capable triple-camera system, and a long-lasting battery with fast charging.

name: ASUS ROG Phone 5
description: The ASUS ROG Phone 5 is a gaming smartphone designed for high-performance gaming with its Snapdragon 888 processor, AMOLED display, and AirTrigger buttons.

name: LG Velvet
description: The LG Velvet features a sleek design, vibrant OLED display, and solid performance. It's a stylish and affordable option for smartphone users.
